website_summaries.verdict: Families with younger children will enjoy these colorful and practically unbreakable spoon rests.
pros: Each rest has a hook to hang on a wall
Available in small or large sizes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! Easy to clean. I bought these and the smaller set to match. I keep the larger ones by the stove and the smaller by my coffee pot. See photos below to gauge size
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Buy the small size
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted. Flexible and easily washablenin the dish washer. I'm glad I read other reviews which had noted that the large size was very big. Based on reviews I bought the small size and they are exactly what I want. I would say the typical size you would pick out in a store. The larger ones must be really big.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Just an all around good product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to replace a ceramic one that broke, and they are great. They are larger than expected, dishwasher safe, heat resistant and you get four of them. What's not to like? Nothing, because they can also be hung up when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: ReViewster

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Amazing Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Amazing Amazing! Wow....I love these👍. I use them as spoon rests, a soft doggie Bowl for my puppy chow (my puppy loves it!) I Use it with a silicone pastry brush to hold a bit of olive oil to coat pans and foods (baked potatoes etc.) I use them to hold ingredients I'm using in recipes...ie. Chopped vegetables or nuts, or fruit. I Love the size, I love the colors......ezpz to clean......what a cool product. One of my best purchases!
customer_reviews.author: dbf

customer_reviews.title: Silicone Spoons Rests A Must in Any Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: INeibo Silicone Spoon Rests are great! Large enough for your bigger spoons, spatulas, wisks, etc. & easy peasy to clean. Silicone is perfect in the kitchen. I have silicone strainers (S M L) I’ve had for yrs. I put the strainer right in the pot of boiling water for spaghetti and/or macaroni. My daughter was here when they arrived & loved then. You get 4 spoon rests, in 4 different colors, so I told her to pick 2. She was thrilled. I highly recommend these silicone spoon rests.
customer_reviews.author: BgInAz

customer_reviews.title: The colors are vibrant and they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: The iNeibo Kitchen Silicone Spoon Rests are BIG. I ordered the small spoon rests and was very surprised when I got them as they were a lot bigger than expected. I even checked the package to make sure I got the correct ones. Yes, I did. Anyway, that being said, the iNeibo Kitchen Silicone Spoon Rests work as expected. They are more flexible than anticipated, so the weight of the spoon sinks the handle prop down, but so far it hasn't decreased the effectiveness of the rest at all. The colors are vibrant and they are easy to clean. I'm happy with my purchase. I received this product at a discount for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: monica0124

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FUNTIONALITY
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical due to the material, but I use these every time I cook for my ladle, spoons, spatulas. They are flexible, heat resistant, and they fit into my drawer stacked upside down. They take up very little space. Very easy to clean. Easy to grab. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: New Leaf

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This product holds normal-sized cooking utensils perfectly. Plenty big and roomy for utensils to fit. Grips them really well, too. Nothing slips or spills from them. We were a little nervous to purchase them at first, afraid that they would be too big and goofy looking. However, it is the perfect size! We display all 4 of them on our counter next to our oven, and we still have plenty of space for our dishes or whatever else we need to put on the counter in front of them. Highly recommend! I would suggest this size and not go smaller, because I can see the smaller options not being able to hold normal cooking utensils well.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: A restful place for my busy spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love these what what I have to say They will hold the smaller spoon to the largest dipper I’m not the neatest cook but I’m a country cook and a very good one I’m told Don’t pay attention to the people who dismissed thieves is being unusable they are a little flimsy but who’s going to pick a spoon rest up with a spoon in it, not me! Buy them enjoy them Keep your counters clean, put them in the dishwasher, store them in a drawer, and use them over and over again. Oh, don’t worry about dropping them on the tile floor and breaking them. They bounce
customer_reviews.author: Judy O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: They are plenty big for your average serving spoon and they are flexible because they are silicon and they are easy to toss into the dishwasher when you are done
customer_reviews.text: One can never have enough spoon rests for your kitchen. My need was twofold. The husband needed some where to put his coffee spoon that wouldn't get in my way. I needed extra spoon rests for when I make multiple things for dinner. You can't be stirring your green beans with your gravy spoon. That's just chaos. These worked out perfectly! They are plenty big for your average serving spoon and they are flexible because they are silicon and they are easy to toss into the dishwasher when you are done.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: They do the job. They're just uglier than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these for a week now, and they certainly provide ample surface to lay my mixing spoons, spatulas and the like without getting food all over my counters. And they clean up easily. (Not sure if they're dishwasher safe). They're a bit larger than I need, and I have to say I find the colors somewhat offensive and bright. Great deal though. I think since I only use two at a time, I might give the other two away.
customer_reviews.author: Bodhi49

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my new glass top stove
customer_reviews.text: 100% love these! Got a new expensive glass top stove and my old spoonholders were too capable of damaging it if dropped or dragged. These are great, soft but very sturdy, and heat resistant (altho my old ones were that, being metal and ceramic.) Hubby likes to help in the kitchen, but he has arthritis and sometimes his grab doesn't work so well. This way, no worries, no blame. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Lester

customer_reviews.title: Nice versatile spoon rests
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some smaller spoon rests for my coffee bar at home to help keep the counter clean. These work fine. I bought the small ones and they are still bigger than I would like but they are OK. I added a photo so you can see the size comparison. They are as big as my other spoon rest for my big cooking utensils. If you are looking for that then these are perfect. I put them in the dishwasher top rack for cleaning and they come out fine. The colors are vibrant. It's nice to have 4 so when some are in the dishwasher I have 1 or 2 extra for coffee the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: Wishing that these were slightly bigger, even if the package of 4, contained 3. In fairness, the product is not necessarily small, but just barely medium in size. All the benefits of silicone resound here with ease of clean and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Legardi11Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: We have had this "cute" spoon holder on the stove that is too small and non-functional. So I got these to have in the cabinet over the stove to grab when I am cooking. They are large enough for anything and easily clean. The handles are sturdy enough to balance heavy cooking utensils. Am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: These rests are nice, larger than I thought but after using them ...
customer_reviews.text: These rests are nice, larger than I thought but after using them with soup ladles, large and small spoons they do the job and keep my counter/stove free of grime and other debris. The fact that you get four for this price you can place them in areas around your kitchen. They are easy to clean and so far have worn well. This is not a complaint per se, and I am not sure if I had an option when I purchased, I would have liked the option of being able to pick my color preference. The colors are bright so it really is not that big a deal.
customer_reviews.author: JoeR

customer_reviews.title: Really handy spoon rests
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical that I could make good use of 4 spoon rests but, boy, was I wrong! They are a really great addition to our kitchen and I am continually putting one in the dishwasher and pulling a clean one out. They hold more than 1 utensil while cooking, don't scratch, and are a snap to clean. We do a lot of cooking and having this set of spoon rests has been very handy and I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: Great to have 4 on hand.
customer_reviews.text: Great to have 4 of these on hand when you're cooking several things on the stove top. One on the left and one on the right. When they're dirty, just throw in the dishwasher and you've got 2 more ready for the next gormet dish you'r making. Stops the messy spills on your counters. Excellent to have 4 on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tess F.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine moved into his own place and needed a spoon rest. I got this pack for him since he is culinary school and often has homework and has to make a few items at a time so I figured having 4 would be great! They are kinda floppy when you pick them up because they are silicone, but they are perfect for spoons of all sizes and very easy to clean. As long as you don't plan to walk around the house trying to hold the spoon by the spoon rest, you will have no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Workable spponrests
customer_reviews.text: Decent spoon rests and the stacking feature is nice. I leave the whole stack on the stove and generally just use the top one and then toss it into the dishwasher when it's dirty. If you need more than one at a time that's easy and handy too with the stack always there.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful
customer_reviews.text: I really love the colors. I leave one out with my morning coffee spoon and replace it with a fresh one daily. My only problem with it, is it leaves a light coffee stain on the light color rubber. Other than that, they seem very durable. Easy to wash and store. I do love the fun bright colors as well. I got the small ones and they are pretty decent in size.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for ways to brighten up the kitchen for get togethers and these worked perfectly. With multiple dishes serving food I now have a location to hold the spoons and keep the counter cleaner. They hold up in the dishwasher and I like the flexibility of the holders
customer_reviews.author: Smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: These are FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: As an older cook, I've always had the traditional, ceramic spoon rests. And they chip, crack, and break. So I started using small plates, which also chip. (Haven't broken one yet..) These are just fantastic! Plus it turns out it's super handy to have more than one. And you just toss them in the washer every night. Yeah, I know, they're just spoon rests.. But I never knew how good they could be before these. I really wish I'd had these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Don Krause

customer_reviews.title: utensil ready
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t to sure about the size. It is perfect. Perfect for cooking utensils any size. Play of space. On the other hand doesn’t take up much counter space. Well made. Easy to clean. Shape is what makes these spoon rests helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Use a lot
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these are great. I use them on a daily basis while cooking, actually use them more than I thought I would. Super easy to wash or toss in the dishwasher top rack. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary O

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My stove can get very hot when my oven is on and when the burners are on as well. I need something that could withstand the heat and not melt. These are perfect and big enough to catch any drippings from any sized spoon, or utensil. Bonus that they are dishwasher safe, so when one gets dirty I throw it in there and use one of the other three. I was gonna give my mom one of the extras but I like them too much, and like getting to choose a color :)
customer_reviews.author: Ally Capriotti

customer_reviews.title: Great spoon rests!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice spoon rest for the price. They are much larger than I expected but this is great as they will fit almost any utensil. Vibrant and fun colors!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love these bendy, floppy spoon rests. I can keep them in a drawer and just toss one (or many) on the counter when I need them to keep my messy spoons off the counter. When I'm done, they pop right in the dishwasher. Probably my very favorite kitchen accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Lallen

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE! They are great spoon rests for cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! They are great spoon rests for cooking and keeping the mess off the counter and stove. I had just recently broken my ceramic one by dropping it in the sink so I was originally looking for another ceramic and ran across these suckers! I am so glad I spent a couple bucks on this 4 pack instead. They are easy to wash if you drop them of course they wont break. and they are so much better to store because they don't take up a lot of space either. I definitely recommend these, especially if you're a klutz like me.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: They are indeed full size
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these full size spoon rests I bought. I liked the first four very much so bought these as well. I do a lot of cooking and sometimes four were not enough. These are identical to the first set except the material is a bit thinner. First set weighed 90-95 grams each but these weigh 70-72 grams each. They are the full size as advertised. I tried another seller and even though they claimed a 9X4 inch size they were only 7X3.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A. Fox

customer_reviews.title: but I was expecting more like hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: Only surprising thing to me was that they are made from a wobbly silicone-- I probably should have expected that, if I'd been more careful in my reading of the product description, but I was expecting more like hard plastic. Not that the silicone is a problem! Just not what I expected, due to my own lack of attention.
customer_reviews.author: Y. B.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what they're supposed to do. Allows for placement of even larger utensils and the hanging loops allow them to be stored in a more versatile way. Plus, they clean incredibly easy. Nothing sticks to them.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Super spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: Great spoon rest, large and easy to clean. Keeps the stovetop nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Baiz

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought these! I like that they are colorful and cute and practical. I always need more than a couple of spoon rests when cooking a meal, so I thought I'd give these a try. They work great, clean up easily, and stack to take up very little space on my counter. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: BargainSeeker

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted- perfect for me who is typically a mess in the kitchen. I love that they won’t break like my old ceramic ones & because they are dishwasher safe I am more likely to toss them into the dishwasher more regularly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CTMom

customer_reviews.title: Large surface holds utensils while you're cooking
customer_reviews.text: These are large so they hold utensils as you're cooking. There are several in package with vibrant colors. Cleanup is easy they wash off in a snap. I wanted something unbreakable these are made of silicone very flexible. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonion Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the right size of holding any spoons, forks or tongs and can keep the counter top surface clean. Even I use this to hold the butter to room temperature when I am preparing ingredients for cake.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Chik

customer_reviews.title: Order the small size
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews says, order the small ones. The small still fit a large whisk or spatula perfectly with no dripping off the edge.
customer_reviews.author: JennBerry

customer_reviews.title: Great colorful product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I am planning on getting another one as a gift as my friends were commenting on the spoon rest. It’s easy to clean, nice size and brings color to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Knez

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy I bought these.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic and unbreakable. Never thought I would buy spoon rests like this. They're great. You can fit a few big spoons on it. and they stay put. Easy to wash and no stains. Very good product. In fact, this is my second order because I love the one I have and when I gifted them my friends loved them too. Got plenty of complements from my cooking friends. All kitchens deserve this spoon rest. Beautiful colors too. Order them. You will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Laben

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT! We are big cookers and entertainers. We remodeled our kitchen an with bright whites, everything shows. These spoon rests are AWESOME! We can use a fryer, boil pasta, make soup, whatever - these tests are perfect. I throw them in the dishwasher and they come out perfectly. Great buy. We use them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenLovesDogs

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They survive the dishwasher. Better then a folded paper towel on the stove that bleeds through and/or catches on fire sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Lumpyrlr

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: As described. Good for holding a ladle. Fairly heat resistant. But not as good as other materials. Great bang for buck I think
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small size spoon rests
customer_reviews.text: Very flexible and versatile spoon rests. Bright cherry colors, use as spoon rest, brush rest, etc. Haven’t put in dishwasher yet but very easy to hand wash as food doesn’t stick to the silicone. Still finding many other usages for these. Happy with the Small size as well
customer_reviews.author: MKB

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous spoon rests
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these - easy to clean, amazing bright colors. I would include these in a wedding shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: JenW

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: They are a little floppier than I expected but they are definately large enough to half just about any cooking utensil, which is exactly what I wanted. The colors are bright and the rests themselves are easy to hang. You could use them as a hot pad under a dish, if you really wanted to do so. They're also dishwasher safe, which can't be said for many of the other spoon rests that I considered. For the price, these are an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: After cracking my much-loved and very vintage spoon rest, I started the search to replace it. Surprisingly, I found little selection and high prices. I typically do not use plastic or silicone on my counters, but decided to take a chance on these. I'm glad I did! I love how large they are, and I absolutely love that there are four of them. Now I can take them across the room, use them for when we have a buffet-style dinner, and then I can throw them in the dishwasher. I'm super pleased.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bates

customer_reviews.title: I do like the bright colors and surprisingly enough they match with ...
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I had envisioned, though I will admit I am notorious for never reading the dimensions of items. I do like the bright colors and surprisingly enough they match with a lot of the kitchen towels I have. Definitely a positive that I can fit a few utensils on there, and I can just toss them in the dishwasher and grab a new one out.
customer_reviews.author: Elmfo

customer_reviews.title: Work like a charm!!
customer_reviews.text: You can't really go wrong. They are big, colorful, good quality silicone. It's a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: jslink

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: These are big! I wasn’t expecting them to be as big as they are but it’s nice. Spatulas and everything can fit in them easily. Great price for four of them and the size! Love them. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Does what I bought them for...
customer_reviews.text: They do what I bought them for, easy to clean and cheaper then using paper towels to set my cooking utensils on, less wasteful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: For the avid cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I got tired of ripping paper towels and using as the utensil mat. This item is pretty efficient. Love the colors! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Supermom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little bit larger but works well. Well made & easy to keep clean. Do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: They are the best you can buy for this type of product and we use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These work great as spoonrest. Easy to clean and store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Spoon/Cooking Utensil Rest
customer_reviews.text: These are very colorful and large. These sit solidly on our counter top and do a great job of keeping it clean while we are cooking. They are silicone so they are a little floppy when you pick them up, but as long as you are aware of that it shouldn't pose any problems. We love them as they are handy, they clean up easily, and come in at a great price. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Krasmer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the silicon spoons, they are perfect. Easy to clean and I love the bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Bll

customer_reviews.title: Not what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Too floppy and flexible that when you put a cooking utensil on it, it doesn’t hold well... it falls to the side. i feel like soup drops would spill over... i had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Maple

customer_reviews.title: Cute kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: So colorful. I plan on using these for appetizer plates as well as spoon rests.
customer_reviews.author: Queenie in IL

customer_reviews.title: Wide, soft, durable, easy to clean spoon rests
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love these. They are large, so large spoons and ladles fit on them perfectly. They clean up easily, in soapy water or the dishwasher. It's great that they're soft, so they don't clatter on the countertop. Since they're flexible, we can store them in the towel drawer. We often use two or three in one cooking session, so it's great to have more than one.
customer_reviews.author: John Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and a great size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I had in mind. They are easy to clean, convenient and I’m happy with the purchase. Makes dinner time spoon rest
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Randall

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional Product
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several spoon rests and decided on these. The different colors are nice as the color coding helps differentiate spoons or ladles when cooking a large meal. Also, the silicone material is flexible unlike the metal ones. This makes washing and storing easier. Also, they are pretty flat compared to some spoon rests which makes for much easier storage.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Haupt

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Spoon Rest
customer_reviews.text: Great product. These spoon rests are perfect. They are large enough to handle any size utensil so you don't have to worry about a messy counter top. They are made of a high quality silicone and they are very durable. Dish washer safe. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for - size, color, clean ability and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Z

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best spoon rests that I have ever bought. Nothing sticks to them and they are very easy to clean. I use them on the side counters by my stove and outside beside my grill and deep fryer. If they are bumped or dropped, they do not chip or break like most spoon rests do. I just love these!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these spoon rests to match the 4 spoons ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these spoon rests to match the 4 spoons that I purchased. I purchased magnetic hooks so I could hang these spoon rests and matching spoons on the side of my refrigerator that is next to my oven. They are flexible and can be put anywhere in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: dino alcini

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, easy to clean and large enough for even the biggest kitchen utensils!
customer_reviews.text: Love these colorful spoon rests! They are large enough for serving spoons, ladles and other kitchen utensils, easy to clean and you can hang them as they "spoon" together. I would definitely recommend them and will purchase more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Feliz Eterno

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: I love these especially if I’m cooking a big meal they are able to be used simultaneously. Also dishwasher safe so clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: A needed item in every kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my son, a single parent; he loves them. The size was a surprise, thought they would be smaller; but turns out is perfect, he says, large enough to hold a large spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce V. Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Get the small
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Easy to clean & colorful. I listened to another reviewer & ordered the smaller size. Very happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: ange0707

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: These are a little thiner than I expected but they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: S de Celis

customer_reviews.title: Order the small
customer_reviews.text: Even the small are huge. These are versatile and can be used to hold pens, kitchen utensil, paperclips and more. They are made of silicone and are light. I love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Superbizmom

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact there are 4 of them so when you have to wash one you have another one to put in it's place. They do not slide all around and they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: lisa a johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Size is great to hold various utensils. Very easy to clean. Colors are true. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much only needed one but it was a great price for four, so I got four. Easy to clean, it’s hangable, and sturdy. Vibrate colors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rosenow

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for multiple utensils at once or just one. Colors are also nice options. I've only had them for about a week now but have already used for cooking on the stove and the grill. Would reccomend to others!
customer_reviews.author: camryse

customer_reviews.title: Large and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large size, after my hard spoon rest broke. I love that these are soft and flexible (non-breakable), easy to clean and broad enough for most of the cooking utensils I use. Other than that not much to say - they're cheap so I sprinkled them around the kitchen. Now my husband has no excuse to leave dirty spoons on the counter to clean up after!
customer_reviews.author: Anamika

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and big enough for all my spoons when cooking! I'm glad that several come in a pack so I have many places to sit my utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I was looking for. Real easy to clean and non breakable. Colorful too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What else Can You Expect
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described and of good quality. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: cPratt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend. It is nice to have 4 so that I can use one for each meal. Easy to stick into the dishwasher and the bigger size fits larger serving spoons well. I assume the silicone material will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and fit the cooking spoons and spatulas.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carrasquillo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Use for coffee spoon. But also use for all cooking utensils.
customer_reviews.author: MTaylor

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Can not say if they are heat resistant! Didn’t put them near heat but my hot spoons has not melted them. I LOVE THEM! Got tired of using saucers!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I really like these colorful silicone spoon rests
customer_reviews.text: I really like these colorful silicone spoon rests. I'm using them almost every day and I don't have to clean my kitchen board every time I cook. It's so convenient and easy to clean. Quality is very good. When they arrived and I saw them for the first time, I thought that they are a little bit too big, but when I started using them I found out that the size is just perfect. I can put a big spoon or spatula on them. When I cook more complicated dishes I'm using all of them and It saves my time when cleaning. Truly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my spatulas and spoons when I'm making handmade soap but they are really nice and I kept one to use in my kitchen at home.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great spoon rest!
customer_reviews.text: These are great spoon rest...better than any I have tried in the past. I like it does slide around, it is easy to wash and it comes in a pact of four. I have one on either side of the stove and one next to the microwave. The size is large enough to accommodate all sizes of utensils. I would recommend these to any cook.
customer_reviews.author: JudyM

customer_reviews.title: Love these spoon rests
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoon rests! No worries about breaking or chipping them. Bright cheerful colors and opening at end so I can hang them up for easy accessibility. These are even larger than I thought they would be which was a plus. Definitely recommending them to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They're so much easier to use than any other soon ready I've tried. Clean up red sauce immediately after cooking and you should have no problems with cleaning either
customer_reviews.author: Nicci

customer_reviews.title: The things I like most about these spoon rests are that they don't ...
customer_reviews.text: The things I like most about these spoon rests are that they don't slide and they don't scratch the surface of my glass-top stove. I've always relied on the odd saucer to hold my sloppy cooking utensils, but these work much better - the cooking spoons and whatnot are stable and don't slip off onto the counter. They also nest really well so that they're easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: nhuffman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Any size spoon fits on these.. doesnt roll off. and wipe clean with a damp cloth or throw in the top of the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the product so far as the items just arrived a couple of days ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Fee

customer_reviews.title: Hold the spoon
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my stove top clean and gives the spoons & spatulas a great place to rest while I'm cooking. Very easy to clean and have kept running strong.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic. I would buy again for friends/family
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I would buy again for friends/family. I love having an assortment of colors and having a 4 pack is very convenient. I have 2 out at all times, one for my coffee spoon and one by my stove. Very easy to clean and they are flexible with a low profile so the extras fit in my drawer without creating disorganization.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Flexible but sturdy for resting cooking utensils
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Flexible but sturdy for resting cooking utensils. Or use for espresso cups with spoons. My husband has an espresso machine, he keeps his cup and espresso spoon on it, no spills. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MotherofMims

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and keeps the stove top and counters ...
customer_reviews.text: Who knew I needed this many spoon rests? I have 3 of them out on the counter and one in a drawer ready to grab. Easy to clean and keeps the stove top and counters from getting messy. If I need to taste something I am cooking and it is too hot to put in my mouth I put a small amount on the spoon rest to cool a bit. They are so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are also super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. My wife loves them as it gives her a place to put hot spoons and utensils while cooking. They are silicone so they stay faily warm and don't get hot, and most importantly the heat doesn't transfer to our counters. They are also super easy to clean, which is a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Latson

customer_reviews.title: These are a great buy
customer_reviews.text: These spoon rests are great! They wash well, the colors are vibrant, they keep their shape, and they look great sitting on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Soto.

customer_reviews.title: ... use as a spoon rest while cook and it's perfect. It's a nice large size that can accommodate ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a spoon rest while cook and it's perfect. It's a nice large size that can accommodate multiple cooking utensils and it's pretty easy to clean! I've been using the same one over and over and haven't noticed any rips or dents or problems, despite high heat and whatnot.
customer_reviews.author: Cady L

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very flexible so I can’t call them sturdy, but great in every other way
customer_reviews.author: Billzie

product_meta.title: iNeibo Kitchen Silicone Spoon Rest, Flexible Almond-Shaped, Silicone Kitchen Utensil Rest Ladle Spoon Holder
feature_bullets: Made of 100% food grade silicone, Heat Resistant, non-toxic, BPA free, durable, flexible
Use for kitchen utensils, gadget, table cutlery, to lay down your spoon, brush, utensils and so on, to keep your stove top, table top, counter clean
The Spoon Rest Sets come with large size of 9.1 x 4.7 x 0.6 inches, big enough to put your kitchen utensil or other gadget on it
Withstand high temperature up to 500° F, you can put your cooking utensils on it even you just took it out of the hot pan
Dishwasher safer, hand-wash recommended to extend product life
